name: Mutual Lock
Mutual Lock stop
Mutual Lock stop
function 1
Get Verbrauch
Read
query:
from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -40m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TestKerim")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

name: function 3
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -40m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TestKerim")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")`
return msg;

name: function 4
Get Zähler
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "zaehlerstand")`
return msg;

name: Get Füllstand
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuellstand")`
return msg;
